amendment.description: An amendment numbered 129 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the use of funds for the Mine Safety and Health Administration to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule entitled, "Lowering Miners' Exposure to Respirable Crystalline Silica and Improving Respiratory Protection.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A071) Agreed to by voice vote.
